content: **crocheted christmas balls in drops muskat theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no r-787 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 21 cm in circumference **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 08 off white 50 g colour 41 bordeaux 50 g colour 61 light taupe 50 g colour 09 nutmeg 50 g colour 80 sage green 50 g colour 81 clay 1 ball weighs approx 11 gram without wadding **accessories** wadding to fill crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge ** 20 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height = 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
